multi_add_portrait;Moulder;MidLeft;Saleh;MidRight
speak;Moulder;*sigh*|Another day goes by and the war still wages on....
speak;Saleh;The last few battles have been difficult.|Their forces were well-coordinated.
speak;Moulder;It wasn't just their warriors that troubled us.|Did you notice their staff wielders?|The precision of their hexes was... unsettling.
speak;Saleh;Yes.|The thunder staff they used on Sir Gilliam nearly led to disaster.
speak;Moulder;He was charging directly at the enemy and almost got hit.|And that fire staff they used on General Seth...|If Natasha hadn't been nearby with a healing staff...
speak;Saleh;Their range is concerning as well.|They can cast from positions we cannot easily reach.
speak;Moulder;In all my years serving Renais, I've never encountered magic users with such deadly efficiency.|It's as if they can sense our vulnerabilities from afar.
speak;Saleh;The ancient texts of Caer Pelyn speak of such practitioners.|Those who forge a connection with their targets across great distances.
speak;Moulder;Is there a way to counter such abilities?|Our healing staves help after the fact, but...|I would prefer to prevent these afflictions entirely.
speak;Saleh;There are methods.|Magical resistance can be cultivated through certain practices.
speak;Moulder;Truly?|Please, Master Saleh, any wisdom you could share would be invaluable.
speak;Saleh;The training would take years.|We don't have that luxury in our current circumstances.
expression;Moulder;HalfCloseEyes
speak;Moulder;I see.|Then we must continue to react rather than prevent.
speak;Saleh;Not necessarily.|There is... another option.
expression;Moulder;NormalBlink
speak;Moulder;Oh?
speak;Saleh;When I departed from Caer Pelyn, my grandmother insisted I take this.
speak;Saleh;She foresaw that dark forces would attempt to control the minds of our allies.
speak;Moulder;What is it that she gave you?
speak;Saleh;This.
speak;Moulder;A staff?|But it's unlike any I've seen before...|The crystal at its peak seems to shimmer with an inner light.
speak;Saleh;It is a barrier staff.|Ancient in design, crafted by the sages of Caer Pelyn centuries ago.
speak;Saleh;When activated, it creates a protective field around our allies.|It strengthens their resistance to magical influence.
speak;Moulder;Such a tool would be invaluable in our current struggles!|But surely you should be the one to wield it?|Your magical prowess far exceeds my own.
speak;Saleh;No.|My role is elsewhere on the battlefield.|You, Father Moulder, are always positioned to observe our forces.
speak;Saleh;You know better than anyone when our allies are most vulnerable.|When protection is most needed.
speak;Moulder;I'm honored by your trust, Master Saleh.|But are you certain?|Such a rare artifact...
speak;Saleh;I am certain.|Take it.|Use it to shield our companions from the enemy's influence.
speak;Moulder;Then I accept this responsibility with the utmost gravity.|I swear by the sacred light that I will use it wisely.
speak;Moulder;Thank you, Master Saleh.|Your generosity may well turn the tide of our coming battles.
speak;Saleh;It is not generosity that motivates me, but necessity.|The darkness that pursues us grows stronger each day.
speak;Saleh;We must use every tool at our disposal if we are to prevail.
speak;Moulder;Indeed.|And with this barrier staff, we shall ensure that our minds remain our own.|Our wills unbent by enemy magic.
speak;Saleh;The staff requires focus to use effectively.|I can show you the proper incantations before tomorrow's march.
speak;Moulder;I would be most grateful for your instruction, Master Saleh.|Together, we shall protect our comrades from these insidious attacks.
